thread.title_full: Hawaiian Airlines is Most Punctual Airline in the U.S. for MayTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Hawaiian Airlines is Most Punctual Airline in the U.S. for MayTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Hawaiian Airlines the most punctual airline in the U.S. for May Published on : Wednesday, July 8, 2015
Hawaiian Airlines completed the month of May 2015 as the U.S. airline industry’s top-ranked carrier for on-time performance and fewest flight cancellations, as reported today by the U.S. Department of Transportation (DOT).
Hawaiian Airlines’ flights arrived on schedule 90.9 percent of the time throughout May, earning it DOT’s top ranking for punctuality. Hawaiian also ranked first in fewest flight cancellations for the month of May with 0.1 percent, representing seven cancellations out of 6,434 flights.
Hawai‘i’s largest and longest-serving airline provides daily non-stop service to Hawai‘i from 11 gateway cities in North America – more cities than any other carrier – using Airbus A330-200 and Boeing 767-300 aircraft, making it the only carrier to offer wide-body, twin-aisle aircraft for all transpacific flights. Hawaiian Airlines also operates approximately 160 daily flights between the Hawaiian Islands using Boeing 717-200 aircraft.
Source:- Hawaiian Airlines
